alert.note: Alert for Clay; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:32PM MDT until August 10 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... East central Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Volin, or 12 miles northeast of Yankton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wakonda around 935 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gayville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
